attributes.action: Temporarily cut fuel duty to ease the burden on the public
attributes.additional_details: The cost of living is getting to be impossible for the average person and with the government taking 57.95 pence per litre of fuel at the pumps it would show good faith and understanding from Westminster if they did this for the people
attributes.background: To help the cost of living amoung people , we are demanding that the fuel tax be cut in half temporarily

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/599089
